summary: Makes some shouts a lot more powerful, capable of one-hit-killing a dragon, or freezing enemies in a block of ice for half an hour.
descriptionHtml:
Makes some shouts a lot more powerful, capable of one-hit-killing a dragon, or freezing enemies in a block of ice for half an hour.

The current shouts that are affected are:
- Aura Whisper: Longer duration
- Elemental Fury: Doubles the attack speed
- Fire Breath: Increases damage with a LOT
- Frost breath: Increases damage with a LOT
- Ice Form: Increases duration to half an hour
- Marked for Death: Increases damage
- Slow Time: Slows down time even more
- Storm Call: Increases all effects and duration

I DO NOT RECOMMEND USING THIS MOD IF YOU WANT A LEGIT PLAYTHROUGH!
author: Redbiertje
